creator: Scott, Thomas, 1841-1915. (author)
description: Scott, Thomas: 1841-1915. To Manitoba with Wolseley expedition, 1870; returned to settle, 1873; long active in the militia, organizing the 95th Regiment, which he commanded during the Saskatchewan Rebellion, 1885; mayor of Winnipeg, 1877-1878; member of House of Commons, 1880-1887; collector of customs in Winnipeg, 1887-1910 (Morgan, Canadian men and women of the time, 1912).
